info.title: EMR FHIR API Documentation
info.description: A comprehensive Electronic Medical Record (EMR) API system built on simplified HL7 FHIR standards. This API provides endpoints for managing patient information, clinical workflows, medications, service requests, billing, and facility management.

post.description: Handle an incoming password reset link request.
